Bioshock Infinite

Game.Name: Bridge Constructor Playground
Game.Comments: Achievements and screen configuration are stored in the same file

Game.Name: Broken Sword 1 - Shadow of the Templars: Director's Cut
Brütal Legend
Game.Comments: Steam uses a subfolder for each user and gog only the main directory. Saves must be moved manually between those versions.

Game.Name: Defender's Quest: Valley of the Forgotten
Game.Comments: The default path of deluxe version on is used. Paths for savegames can be changed. Change path for old drm-free versions in ~/.appdata/DefendersQuest/Local\ Store/path_config.xml and import old savegames ingame.

Game.Name: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided™
Game.Comments: Feral includes a link to steam's userdata, but it assumes standard steam paths.

Game.Name: English Country Tune
Game.Comments: Save game file also contains settings

Game.Name: Girls Like Robots
Game.Comments: Save games and settings in one file No backup for steam version

Game.Comments: Steam savegames and DRM-free savegames appear to be incompatible

Game.Name: Megabyte Punch
Game.Comments: Deletes savegame file when uninstalled Steamcloud not working

Game.Name: PixelJunk™ Shooter
Game.Comments: Steam has special savegame for each user

Game.Name: Star Wars: Dark Forces
Game.Comments: Steam offers only a windows version, data must be run with native dosbox. GBM can not determine the location of the config file.

Game.Name: Steel Storm: Burning Retribution
Game.Comments: Steam version and DRM-free have different save games

Game.Name: The Bridge
Game.Comments: Steam version is not backed up

Game.Name: Undertale
Game.Comments: steam cloud does not store savegames

Game.Name: Warzone 2100
Game.Comments: Each version has own savegames If you use a different version, please adapt the path

Game.Name: Zombie Night Terror
Game.Comments: Steam uses a subfolder for each user and gog only the main directory. Saves must be moved manually between those versions.
